title: Ticket #4988: changes to defaults for close of 8.3 series
description:
This ticket is to track proposed changes to either HTCondor configuration defaults OR changes to Linux settings that would be good to do upon package installation.

Append your ideas to the appropriate list with your name by each item.

HTCondor Config Changes

  1. done and doc done let's change NEGOTIATOR_INFORM_STARTD to false by default in v8.3.7. All our big pools require it. (TJ)
  2. deferred shared port on by default in v8.5.0 (master), and turn on everywhere in CHTC when v8.3.7 is deployed. (TJ)
  3. deferred ENABLE_IPV6=true with v8.5.1 and turn on everywhere in CHTC when v8.5.0 is deployed. (TJ)
  4. collector updates use TCP by default in v8.3.7 (but view_collector updates, like in a collector tree, still use UDP - we want everything going to top level collector over UDP. also we want world ads to be udp) (Jaime)
  5. done Set a default for RECEIVE_MSGS_DURATION for 250. [[ unless CMS testing gives evidence otherwise - see #4928 ]] (TJ) No notice of this will go into the manual or version history, as this is a developer tuning knob, and is intentionally left out of the manual.
  6. Go over every setting we did to make the global CMS pool scale as documented at CmsScaleTestSetup (Jaime)
  7. done STARTER_DEBUG in param table has obsolete flag (ToddT)
  8. done and doc done MAX_JOBS_PER_SUBMISSION default to to 20,000 (TJ)
  9. done and doc done MAX_JOBS_PER_OWNER default to 100,000 (TJ)
  10. 8.3.8? FILE_TRANSFER_DISK_LOAD_THROTTLE, MAX_CONCURRENT_UPLOADS, MAX_CONCURRENT_DOWNLOADS (email Brian, Garhan, DanB for advice?) (ToddT)
  11. done and doc needs to be checked before it can be marked as done Up MAX_JOBS_RUNNING on windows from 200 to 2000, leave the Unix default alone. (TJ)
  12. done and doc done Default PRIVATE_NETWORK_NAME to $(FULL_HOSTNAME) - Right now there is no default, meaning even sending a child alive command from one process to another on the same machine will go via CCB (TJ)
  13. Default ALLOW_PSLOT_PREEMPTION to True in startd and schedd and false in the negotiator for v8.3.7. Consider for v8.5.0 also default to True in the negotiator iff consumption policies are disabled. Turn it to true in the negotiator in CHTC for v8.3.7. (jfrey)
  14. done Change default timeout for SEC_DEFAULT_AUTHENTICATION_TIMEOUT from infinite to some value (20 sec?). doc's say it's 20 seconds now. (TJ)
  15. Investigate stopping fsync of user event logs in v8.5.0. (Kent)
  16. done and doc done Set JobLeaseDuration from 20 min to 40 min (TJ)
  17. done and doc done Set WANT_VACATE = True (TJ)
  18. done Fix ALLOW_NEGOTIATOR_SCHEDD in the meta knobs (TJ)
  19. done and doc done Change SCHEDD_SEND_VACATE_VIA_TCP default to True (Jaime)

Linux scalability config changes

Moved to #5106. (ToddM)

For FILE_TRANSFER_DISK_LOAD_THROTTLE -

I would recommend a default of "2 to 3". This is what CMS has seen as usable in production.

For each of the 19 items listed above in this ticket description, I'd like to see them prefixed with done once the owner of this ticket (TJ) confirms that each change has been pushed into git. Right now this ticket is in docpending mode, but there is no way for me to easily verify that all 19 changes above were completed. Switching ticket back to state Active until confirmation has been made that we didn't miss any of the above....
